Title: Requires New York city identity cards to be accepted as valid written evidence of age or identification
Summary: Requires New York city identity cards to be accepted as valid written evidence of age or identification.
LawCode: Amd §3-115, NYC Ad Cd; add §390-d, Gen Bus L; amd §65-b, ABC L; amd §§1399-c & 1399-cc, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, the general business law, the alcoholic beverage control law and the public health law, in relation to acceptance of New York city identity cards as valid written evidence of age or identification
